Name: Synthwave FURY
About the game: FEEL THE FURY. Speed and fight your way across an endless highway of neon lights and synthetic palm trees in this virtual world of pure retro '80s nostalgia. Welcome to the vibrant world of Synthwave FURY, experience the thrills of a high-stakes police chase all within a procedurally-crafted wonderland of neo-80s virtual futurism. Inspired by the iconic sounds of the Synthwave, Retrowave and Vaporwave genres, Synthwave FURY was designed to be an engaging experience to be fit together perfectly with an assortment of fresh neo-retro beats. A simple yet thrilling experience, choose your roadster and then mount up for the ride of a lifetime. Speed across neon ridges and through stylised cities of light and glass, drifting near-vertical turns and blasting enemies to survive an action-packed pursuit for as long as possible. Immerse yourself in a dream world of idealised retro wonder in Synthwave FURY! 3 DIFFERENT CARS TO SPEED AROUND IN PROCEDURALLY GENERATED MAPS WITH MULTIPLE UNIQUE LAYOUTS TO CHOOSE FROM ENGAGING VEHICULAR COMBAT SYSTEM INTELLIGENT ENEMY VEHICLE AI RADICAL STYLISED VISUALS & ENVIRONMENT ADDICTIVE COMBO SYSTEM 35 GROOVIN' TRACKS A CUSTOM SONG ADDING SYSTEM
